channel.title: I just need a good text effect for my website
channel.description:
well, the website I need this done at is [url=http://phleon.kloplop321.com]http://phleon.kloplop321.com[/url]. I just need the text redone. I would like it Sleek, Metallic, and slightly pixelated :)
fix my crappy text GFX please?
Thanks in advance :D

item.title: I just need a good text effect for my website

item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I use Flash Pro Educational 8 (educational means legally bought through a university, which my mother happens to work at one, at discount and without any books), I donâ€™t see what Swish Has to offer me as the last time I tried it, it just seemed like a cheap fake. any fonts to recommend? although I highly wish It was just a plain image
